title: Can we please delete the "presets"
body: I'm sure it's come up before, but man can we please be able to delete the presets? I never use them

replies.body:
They're adding an option to hide them (or perhaps the current hiding option will also hide them in champ select).

Rioter already mentioned they are working on this.
Hey, that was me and you're correct! We're going to extend the current hiding option to champ select. :)

you could disable them after level 30 

i can't think of a time where real players would want to use them. they're ok when you're figuring out the game but not all that great for 99% of the roster. i'd rather just have 5 open slots for my own rune setups.

They exist and are not able to be deleted because they are used as our technical fallback - if you have no other valid pages (maybe a rune was disabled that you put in everything or you only built one page but never finished it or  countless other situations) you at least ALWAYS have the presets.  Everyone always has the presets. This means you will never get into a game without any runes at all b/c every player has a backup set of guaranteed usable, valid, slightly-different-than-normal pages. This is why we're opting for hiding instead of deleting. 

Also, Triistana further down has a concrete example of a post level 30 player who uses them but folks have downvoted that comment?
Why isn't there a similar failsafe for junglers who forget Smite?
RIGHT! {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Because of people who swap roles in champ select. Jungler swaps with someone else to be jungler and a summoner spell gets force swapped out to smite despite having swapped to a different position - it'd suck. They'd have to do some technical work arounds to it, have 'official' swapping agreements in champ select for it to work as a fall back without causing more problems.
so you just make everyone take the tank one which is useless on an adc.

But a preset made me go Soraka support with the domination preset... it should at least fit the champion and role, the runes were mostly useless... the technicall fallback was as bad as having nothing
Can we at least "unlock" them for anyone post-30 so that we have more than 2 pages to edit?

>you at least ALWAYS have the presets.

Except I was in an ARAM recently where no runes showed for one of my allies during load-in.
That is VERY bad. If you ever see this happen, please please send in a bug report to us with the match history link/any weird details.
This was an EA answer if I've ever heard one {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
But but... who we gonna troll for not having keystone the way things are now!?  You have removed a key aspect of social hierarchy and it just stinks!
I don't think we're getting an additional 5 slots either way. But the hide option should make it so you never have to see them again.

I both appreciate you guys giving us options to hide these but that they exist at all. One of my friends doesn't really have time to make his own runes, and lately when we start a game he just asks me what's the best preset for a particular champion and has made it much easier for him to hop into a League game!

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
Can you also bring back the ability to sort them manually? Thanks.

Might I suggest instead of having these presets maybe have a specific rune setup for each unique champion.that way, we have the option to choose one of our own rune setups or opt to use the prebuilt setup for that particular champion. This way we donâ€™t have an adc coming to game with a resolve preset or support tank with press the attack. By having unique optional rune setups for each champion, it will help new players quickly understand optimal or near optimal builds and still have the option for a variant with the 6 pages we have to mess around with.
to much logic going on here tone it down.
Will we also eventually get the ability to have the sorting method for champ select save?

>
> Hey, that was me and you're correct! We're going to extend the current hiding option to champ select. :)

hiding them is always nice I guess. I don't see why you wouldn't just let people delete them though if they wanted to
Can we have the option to edit our favorite champions outside of champ select and have champ select remember our sorting choices?

It still sucks to be reminded that they are there whenever I delete the last runepage and see "Inspiration the timeless".

I really wish that we could just delete them, but it's nice to see that they will be hidden everywhere soon.
I still wish they just let us have more than 2 without having to pay for 8 billion rune pages.
You realize people who are still learning the game likely WILL use the presets until they learn about making their own? The presets are a good thing to have.

I am not saying get rid of them, I am saying give the Option to get rid of them.
Make a post about it.

honestly i think they should at least do this;

let us change the name of the presets
make the four presets a set of the most picked options by the community

just like when everyone was playing morgana support and you change her recomended items, change the presets to reflex what is played more, things some pages are rather ok but with options that not many ppl would take (no scorch on comet, no aery page for support champions, no aftershock page?)
I'd delete them in a second if I could
Didn't know you used the forums mate. Where's tactical cards?
Ah I get it. TF & Gragas, good memes boys.
Don't shit talk Tobias Fate and Gross Gore mate.
Tobias and Gross who? Oh, oh those guys. Right, aren't they uh...semi-famous Heroes of the Storm players yeah?

A rioter said they planned on adding a option to allow for hiding them. However, I'm not sure why it has yet to be implemented. Seems rather minuscule and something they can set a small team to work on for a day or two that would make a lot of people happy.
i hate it when it auto selects the preset while im changing one because the last person locks in their pick that is annoying af.
I'd rather have more pages, a preset is nice
Okay I have a question to go along with this...as we level up do we get more pages for runes are are we just allowed to have two custom pages and then have the 4 premade?

I can have a total of 10 rune pages at the moment (6 made and 4 presets) 
so you either get them from leveling up or from buying more pages, idk. cause I bought a bunch back in the older system

> [{quoted}](name=Druushk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oOFW83VT,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-12-11T18:02:27.916+0000)

> so you either get them from leveling up or from buying more pages, idk. cause I bought a bunch back in the older system

Ah okay thank you I was very confused. I only have one rune page done for supports and I was going to work on one for a more offensive build for damages but I was worried that I wouldn't be able to go any further than that. 
Thank you again.

In case it wasn't clear, you do not get more rune pages for free. Druushk has 10 pages because he bought them in the old system and they carried over. If you want more than the 2 free ones, you have to buy them for 6300BE or 590RP.

If you're starting out, I'd recommend just looking up runes for the champ you're playing on probuilds or something and editing it in champ select, that currency will be better spent on champions.
you can actually have up to 20 and thats not even including the presets
